author: akshaybabloo
body:
I am getting the following error when trying to install PowerShell core in Docker:

```
Err:5 https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/18.04/prod bionic/main amd64 Packages
  File has unexpected size (72463 != 72485). Mirror sync in progress? [IP: 13.76.190.189 443]
  Hashes of expected file:
   - Filesize:72485 [weak]
   - SHA512:c26c6c86803325466bd742789acc9e54a745d045a6b3af1ce26d34e98c9a4904c6873db0cc9b2be7f99385ef6e6237f6e5cd6776fe6c0a1737cae2a67f8566f9
   - SHA256:3fe8d8513549a43d26d917287a5a832d0c577ee62ac37b1daae5aade614dff54
   - SHA1:e2a5cc1ecb44c77caa98eebac08b9d9f4b1e8215 [weak]
   - MD5Sum:30a55059e4b9ef8d02cca7e7acc01cdb [weak]
  Release file created at: Tue, 20 Aug 2019 22:43:21 +0000
Hit:6 http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu bionic-backports InRelease
Fetched 3226 B in 1s (2563 B/s)
Reading package lists...
E: Failed to fetch https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/18.04/prod/dists/bionic/main/binary-amd64/Packages.gz  File has unexpected size (72463 != 72485). Mirror sync in progress? [IP: 13.76.190.189 443]
   Hashes of expected file:
    - Filesize:72485 [weak]
    - SHA512:c26c6c86803325466bd742789acc9e54a745d045a6b3af1ce26d34e98c9a4904c6873db0cc9b2be7f99385ef6e6237f6e5cd6776fe6c0a1737cae2a67f8566f9
    - SHA256:3fe8d8513549a43d26d917287a5a832d0c577ee62ac37b1daae5aade614dff54
    - SHA1:e2a5cc1ecb44c77caa98eebac08b9d9f4b1e8215 [weak]
    - MD5Sum:30a55059e4b9ef8d02cca7e7acc01cdb [weak]
   Release file created at: Tue, 20 Aug 2019 22:43:21 +0000
E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
```

<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6?view=powershell-6).

-->

# Steps to reproduce
This is what I have in my Dockerfile

```docker
# Install PowerShell
RUN apt-get update --fix-missing && \
    apt-get install -y software-properties-common openssh-server apt-utils wget bzip2 ca-certificates curl git bash libglib2.0-0 libxext6 libsm6 libxrender1 && \
    # apt-get install -y build-essential git openjdk-8-jre openjdk-8-jdk && \
    wget -q https://packages.microsoft.com/config/ubuntu/18.04/packages-microsoft-prod.deb && \
    dpkg -i packages-microsoft-prod.deb && \
    apt-get update && \
    add-apt-repository universe && \
    apt-get install -y powershell && \
    apt-get clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
```

# Expected behavior

This should install the pwsh.

# Actual behavior

But I get the following error

```none
Err:5 https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/18.04/prod bionic/main amd64 Packages
  File has unexpected size (72463 != 72485). Mirror sync in progress? [IP: 13.76.190.189 443]
  Hashes of expected file:
   - Filesize:72485 [weak]
   - SHA512:c26c6c86803325466bd742789acc9e54a745d045a6b3af1ce26d34e98c9a4904c6873db0cc9b2be7f99385ef6e6237f6e5cd6776fe6c0a1737cae2a67f8566f9
   - SHA256:3fe8d8513549a43d26d917287a5a832d0c577ee62ac37b1daae5aade614dff54
   - SHA1:e2a5cc1ecb44c77caa98eebac08b9d9f4b1e8215 [weak]
   - MD5Sum:30a55059e4b9ef8d02cca7e7acc01cdb [weak]
  Release file created at: Tue, 20 Aug 2019 22:43:21 +0000
Hit:6 http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu bionic-backports InRelease
Fetched 3226 B in 1s (2563 B/s)
Reading package lists...
E: Failed to fetch https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/18.04/prod/dists/bionic/main/binary-amd64/Packages.gz  File has unexpected size (72463 != 72485). Mirror sync in progress? [IP: 13.76.190.189 443]
   Hashes of expected file:
    - Filesize:72485 [weak]
    - SHA512:c26c6c86803325466bd742789acc9e54a745d045a6b3af1ce26d34e98c9a4904c6873db0cc9b2be7f99385ef6e6237f6e5cd6776fe6c0a1737cae2a67f8566f9
    - SHA256:3fe8d8513549a43d26d917287a5a832d0c577ee62ac37b1daae5aade614dff54
    - SHA1:e2a5cc1ecb44c77caa98eebac08b9d9f4b1e8215 [weak]
    - MD5Sum:30a55059e4b9ef8d02cca7e7acc01cdb [weak]
   Release file created at: Tue, 20 Aug 2019 22:43:21 +0000
E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
```

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I cannot repro. This was likely a temporary issue with the packages.microsoft.com service.

title: Unable to install on Ubuntu 18.04 Docker: File has unexpected size
